definition: to garrison the border/to guard the frontier/exile to a border garrison post
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The corps' workers are direct cartier of safeguarding the borders.
sentences.chinese: 兵团职工是屯垦戍边的直接载体。

sentences.english: Therefore, the nine fort towns were set up to defend the frontier, where some defending talents showed themselves.
sentences.chinese: 明设九镇防边，一批戍边干才脱颖而出。

sentences.english: The military personnel and their family member of guards the border area favored treatment, they have the reliable sufficient social security.
sentences.chinese: 戍边军人家属受到优待，有可靠充足的生活保障。

sentences.english: The corps' workers are direct carrier of safeguarding the borders.
sentences.chinese: 兵团职工是屯垦戍边的直接载体。

definition: border station/strategic defensive position on frontier
to open up land for cultivation/to garrison troops to open up land
to enlist/to serve in the army
to guard one's territory/to protect the country
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
Anxi county, former name of Guazhou county 瓜州縣|瓜州县[Gua1 zhou1 xian4] in Jiuquan 酒泉[Jiu3 quan2], Gansu
Liaodong peninsula between Bohai 渤海 and Yellow sea/east and south of Liaoning province/east of Liao river 遼河|辽河
